function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of focus on environmental protection and social issues","Impact":"Continued environmental degradation and social problems","Mitigation":"Implement sustainable development goals and responsible economic policies","Technologies":"Sustainable technologies, renewable energy, and eco-friendly production methods","People":"Global population, marginalized communities, and future generations","Owner":"Government, private and public sectors, and international organizations"},{"Description":"Failure to address sustainable development goals","Impact":"Persistent poverty, hunger, and inequality; environmental degradation and health issues","Mitigation":"Implement policies and practices that support sustainable development goals","Technologies":"Renewable energy, sustainable agriculture, and waste management technologies","People":"Communities, developing countries, and future generations","Owner":"Governments, NGOs, and international organizations"},{"Description":"Disregard for sustainable consumption and production","Impact":"Resource depletion, increased environmental pollution, and ecosystem degradation","Mitigation":"Promote responsible consumption, sustainable production practices, and circular economy principles","Technologies":"Recycling technologies, sustainable packaging, and eco-friendly manufacturing processes","People":"Consumers, businesses, and future generations","Owner":"Businesses, governments, and regulatory bodies"}]}
